text: A tile vault is a vault built setting thin bricks by their edges with quick plaster, following a predefined curve to create a thin and light vault.https://www.arct.cam.ac.uk/research/natural-materials-and- structures/masonry-vaulting/masonry-vaulting The oldest tiled vaults date back to Islamic architecture. Not to be confused with pitched-brick vaults. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Vault (architecture)
title: Tile vault
